Detailed Description

Drag and Drop type that encodes a DzContentFile pointer.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DzContentFileDrag::DzContentFileDrag ( const DzContentFile *  contentFile  ) 

Creates a new drag object that encodes a pointer to a content file. This drag object provides the MIME type: "DAZStudio/contentfile-ptr"

Parameters:
contentFile The content file for this drag item.
dragSource The widget that this drag originated at.

Member Function Documentation

DzContentFile * DzContentFileDrag::decode ( const QMimeData *  src  )  [static]

Convenience function for decoding the MIME type: "DAZStudio/contentfile-ptr"

Parameters:
src The mime source to decode.
Returns:
A pointer to a content file object as decoded form src.
QByteArray DzContentFileDrag::encode ( const DzContentFile *  contentFile  )  [static]

Convenience function to encode a content file pointer into the MIME type: "DAZStudio/contentfile-ptr".

Parameters:
contentFile The content file pointer to encode.
Returns:
A QByteArray containing the pointer encoded as MIME data.
